Text:
Hello, it's Jack Lucien here. Thank you for sharing my songs with the world.

As a huge fan of Pirate Bay, I will be uploading all of my back catalogue up here soon.

Screw the government, long live Pirate Bay!

PS. Should I be insulted that nobody is seeding this? Email my record label (info@unconditionalrecords.co.uk), and we'll send you the mp3 :)
